thread.title: Japanese scientists make booze from trees

title: Japanese scientists make booze from trees
text:
Japanese scientists make booze from trees 12:37pm EDT - 01:35
For centuries, trees have provided mankind with daily necessities such as paper and rubber, now, scientists in Japan have discovered a new use for trees: making booze. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
For centuries, trees have provided mankind with daily necessities such as paper and rubber, now, scientists in Japan have discovered a new use for trees: making booze. Stuart McDill reports.
